mdRecord.dcterms:title: Suitcase
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The suitcase is black leather with a green cloth interior. It has a large University of Virginia sticker on one side and a note affixed to the other which reads, "Letters from Prentice Kinser Jr to Gladys Whitten Kinser while he was in Africa, Italy during World War II." Prentice Kinser Jr. served with the 8th Evacuation Hospital during World War II.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Bags
